Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Increases the amount of funds that may be used per dwelling unit to modernize certain authorities used by the housing trust fund corporation
Summary: Increases the amount of funds that may be used per dwelling unit to modernize certain authorities used by the housing trust fund corporation.
LawCode: Amd ยง1102, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to the amount of funds that may be used per dwelling unit to modernize certain authorities used by the housing trust fund corporation
